Verses: 1 pinbu, Moseyum Aaronum Paarvonidaththil Poi: Isravelin Dhevanaagiya Karththar Vanaandharaththile Enakkup Pandikai Kondaadumbadi En Janangalaip Pogavidavendum Endru Sollugiraar Endraargal.
2 adharkup Paarvon: Naan Isravelaip Pogavidak Karththarin Vaarththaiyaik Ketkiradharku Avar Yaar? Naan Karththarai Ariyen; Naan Isravelaip Poga Viduvadhillai Endraan.

3 appozhudhu Avargal: Ebireyarudaiya Dhevan Engalaich Sandhiththaar; Naangal Vanaandharaththil Moondrunaal Pirayaanam Poi, Engal Dhevanaagiya Karththarukkup Baliyidumbadi Pogavidavendum; Pogaadhirundhaal, Avar Kollai Noyum Pattayamum Engal Mel Varappannuvaar Endraargal.
4 egipthin Raajaa Avargalai Nokki: Moseyum Aaronumaagiya Neengal Janangalaith Thangal Velaigalaivittuk Kalaiyap Pannugiradhu Enna? Ungal Sumaigalaich Sumakkap Pongal Endraan.
5 pinnum Paarvon: Idho, Dhesaththil Janangal Migudhiyaai Irukkiraargal; Avargal Sumai Sumakkiradhai Vittu Oindhirukkumbati Seygireergale Endraan.
6 andriyum, Annaalile Paarvon Janangalin Aalottigalaiyum Avargal Thalaivaraiyum Nokki:
7 sengal Velaikku Neengal Munpola Ini Janangalukku Vaikkol Kodukka Vendaam; Avargal Thaangale Poith Thangalukku Vaikkol Serkkattum.

8 avarkal Munseydhu Koduththa Kanakkinbadiye Sengal Seyyumbadi Sollungal; Adhile Neengal Ondrum Kuraikka Vendaam, Avargal Sombalaai Irukkiraargal; Adhinaal Naangal Poi Engal Dhevanukkup Baliyiduvom Endru Kookkuralidugiraargal.
9 andha Manidhar Mel Munnilum Adhiga Velaiyaich Sumaththungal, Adhil Avargal Kashtappadattum: Veen Vaarththaigalukku Avargal Sevikodukka Vidaadhirungal Endru Kattalaiyittaan.
10 appozhudhu Janangalin Aalottigalum Avargal Thalaivargalum Purappattup Poi Janangalai Nokki: Ungalukku Vaikkol Koduppadhillai;
11 neengale Poi Ungalukku Akappadugira Idangalil Vaikkol Sambaadhiyungal; Aanaalum Ungal Velaiyil Ondrum Kuraikkappaduvadhillai Endru Paarvon Sollugiraar Endraargal.
12 appozhudhu Vaikkolukkup Padhilaakath Thaalatigalaich Serkkumbadi Janangal Egipthu Dhesam Engum Sidharipponaargal.
13 aalottigal Avargalai Nokki: Vaikkolirundha Naalil Seydhabadiye Ungal Velaigalai Ovvoru Naalilum Seydhu Mudiyungal Endru Solli, Avargalaith Thuridhappaduththinaargal.

14 paarvonudaiya Aalottigal Isravel Puththirarmel Vaiththa Avargaludaiya Thalaivargalai Nokki: Sengal Velaiyil Neengal Mun Seydhadhu Pola Netrum Indrum En Seyyavillai Endru Kettu, Avargalai Adiththaargal.
15 appozhudhu Isravel Puththirarin Thalaivar Paarvonidaththil Poich Saththamittu: Umadhu Adiyaarukku Neer Ippadich Seygiradhu Enna?

16 umadhu Adiyaarukku Vaikkol Kodaadhirundhum, Sengal Aruththuth Tharavendum Endru Engalukkuch Sollugiraargal; Ummudaiya Janangalidaththil Kutramirukka, Umadhu Adiyaaraagiya Naangal Adikkappadugirom Endraargal.
17 adharku Avan: Neengal Sombalaayirukkireergal, Sombalaayirukkireergal; Adhinaaldhaan Poga Vendum, Karththarukkup Baliyidavendum Engireergal.
18 poi, Velaiseyyungal, Ungalukku Vaikkol Kodukkappaduvadhillai; Aanaalum Kanakkinbadiye Neengal Sengalai Oppuvikkavendum Endraan.
19 neengal Ovvoru Naalilum Aruththuth Theeravendiya Sengalile Ondrum Kuraikkappadaadhu Endru Sollappattadhinaale, Isravel Puththirarin Thalaivar Thangalukku Ikkattu Vandhadhu Endru Kandaargal.
20 avargal Paarvonudaiya Samugaththaivittup Purappadugaiyil, Vazhiyil Nindra Mosekkum Aaronukkum Edhirppattu,

21 avargalai Nokki: Neengal Paarvonin Kangalukku Munbaagavum Avarudaiya Oozhiyakkaararin Kangalukku Munbaagavum Engal Vaasanaiyaik Keduththu, Engalaik Kollumbadi Avargal Kaiyile Pattayaththaik Koduththadhinimiththam, Karththar Ungalaip Paarththu Niyaayam Theerkkakkadavar Endraargal.
22 appozhudhu Mose Karththaridaththil Thirumbippoi: Aandavare, Indha Janangalukkuth Theengu Varap Panninadhenna? En Ennai Anuppineer?
23 naan Umadhu Naamaththaikkondu Pesumbadi Paarvonidaththil Piravesiththadhu Mudhal Avan Indha Janangalai Ubaththiravappaduththugiraan; Neer Ummudaiya Janangalai Vidudhalaiyaakkavillaiye Endraan.
